Raul de Souza musical universe


The repertoire moves through different musical styles and was handpicked by the artist and Glauco Solter, bassist, to illustrate the route of his 60-year career. Among the composers are honored Tom Jobim, JoÃƒÂ£o Donato, Pixinguinha, Carrilho, Nelson Ukulele and Spiritual John Coltrane's favorite Trombonist.
